Definition:Â  Administrative Error
An
administrative error
occurs when VA pays benefits to a beneficiary in an amount that exceeds their entitlement due to actions VA took that usually, but not always, stem from misapplication of the law.
Administrative errors include errors in judgment on the part of VA employees.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B - Correcting the Erroneous Payment of Benefits to a Beneficiary
